Articles.Content:
Get ready for some ***EXTREME REACTION PICS***

![crm1s2_1.jpg](http://www.mhhe.com/physsci/chemistry/chang7/esp/folder_structure/cr/m1/s2/assets/images/crm1s2_1.jpg)

![nuclear-fission-diagram.PNG](http://images.tutorvista.com/cms/images/38/nuclear-fission-diagram.PNG)

I'm a jerk, aren't I.

My VIP coach is VIPpier than the others:

![beebecleg2.jpg](http://underbrew.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2013/10/beebecleg2.jpg)

![10451.jpg](http://beenseen.wpengine.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/10451.jpg)

![SilverVista%20fall%203.jpg](http://www.durangotrain.com/sites/default/files/images/SilverVista%20fall%203.jpg)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Get ready for some ***EXTREME REACTION PICS***
> 
> 
> I'm a jerk, aren't I.

That's really funny!

\*Politely Boards Hype Train\*

One to the release please. 

\*politely takes an empty seat near a window if available.\*

> 
> Yes. VIP stands for Very In-fact-actually-a Person. Every coach is a VIP coach.

This VIP coach looks nice!

![vip-limo-bus-interior4.jpg](http://santoslimousine.com/wp-content/gallery/vip-limo-coach-party-bus-in-nj/vip-limo-bus-interior4.jpg)
how much does a ticket cost? I'll buy one, no matter what the cost! a (very important person type vip) in fact!

I don't mind if the experimentals are going to take longer than usual for this version (and they should!). I'll have all sorts of other fun stuff to do in the meantime. It is pretty cool that we're in the final stretch, though.
This is kinda dumb people. Is this a special 1.0 thing? please don't tell me you do this every update.

> 
> This VIP coach looks nice!
> ![vip-limo-bus-interior4.jpg](http://santoslimousine.com/wp-content/gallery/vip-limo-coach-party-bus-in-nj/vip-limo-bus-interior4.jpg)

Ummm, that's a bus.(Sorry!)

> 
> please don't tell me you do this every update.

You must be new around here.

> 
> This is kinda dumb people. Is this a special 1.0 thing? please don't tell me you do this every update.

Unfortunately they do.

Yeah,

.90

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101290-The-Official-HypeTrain-0-90-Voyage-Thread-%28Experimentals!-Choo-Choo-Dangit!%29?highlight=.25+hype+train](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101290-The-Official-HypeTrain-0-90-Voyage-Thread-%28Experimentals!-Choo-Choo-Dangit!%29?highlight=.25+hype+train)

.25

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94045-0-25-Hype-A320!!!!!!-Taxi-ing-to-runway!!!!-Dancing-slinkies!-Pheonix-gas!!?highlight=a320](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94045-0-25-Hype-A320!!!!!!-Taxi-ing-to-runway!!!!-Dancing-slinkies!-Pheonix-gas!!?highlight=a320)

.24

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79878-The-unofficially-official-0-24-Kerbapalooza-Thread-Now-extra-HYPETRAIN!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79878-The-unofficially-official-0-24-Kerbapalooza-Thread-Now-extra-HYPETRAIN!)

People agree with you:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94162-My-God-can-we-stop-with-un-neccasary-Hype-Mobiles?highlight=.25+hype+train](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94162-My-God-can-we-stop-with-un-neccasary-Hype-Mobiles?highlight=.25+hype+train)
1 ticket Please. \*Hands over 1 Fund\* <-- Probagly worth about 10,000 USD

> 
> 1 ticket Please. \*Hands over 1 Fund\* <-- Probagly worth about 10,000 USD

Actually, it's $250USD:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97324-The-actual-Fund-value](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97324-The-actual-Fund-value)

I have a feeling we will have an extended hype period this time around, but that's OK ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

So when do people think? Mid to end of May probably for release maybe?

Mine own all yours 

![metra1.jpg](https://suucakes.files.wordpress.com/2012/02/metra1.jpg)

> 
> This is kinda dumb people. Is this a special 1.0 thing? please don't tell me you do this every update.

Don't attack the HypeCulture! It is a *right* to get hyped weeks in advance, post dumb posts consisting only of the word 'HYPE', and post stupid reaction images. So don't *infringe* on the *rights, yo.* /Sarcasm

In all seriousness though, it is possibly the dumbest thing outside of the Forum Games sub-forum.

> 
> I have a feeling we will have an extended hype period this time around, but that's OK ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> So when do people think? Mid to end of May probably for release maybe?

If there are 2 months of these "hype threads" so help me Jupiter I will rage.

> 
> Don't attack the HypeCulture! It is a *right* to get hyped weeks in advance, post dumb posts consisting only of the word 'HYPE', and post stupid reaction images. So don't *infringe* on the *rights, yo.* /Sarcasm
> In all seriousness though, it is possibly the dumbest thing outside of the Forum Games sub-forum.

I can finally see why your hype level is only 5/10

> 
> If there are 2 months of these "hype threads" so help me Jupiter I will rage.

Considering you are a historian and reference Jupiter, how did peoples get hyped in Ancient Rome without trains?

Sometimes you are on the Hype Train cuz, well, that's just ***HOW YOU DO.***

![283191.jpg](http://7770647a14b0867efc75-b939f832d8cd9c860ce8909163419528.r92.cf2.rackcdn.com/283191.jpg)

***HYPE!!!!!!!!!!!***

Keeping the tradition alive.

> 
> Considering you are a historian and reference Jupiter, how did peoples get hyped in Ancient Rome without trains?

Games, triumphs, feasts, and theatre.
Ah, Beautiful Spam

> 
> Games, triumphs, feasts, and theatre.

I was imaging Egyptian 'Reaction Hieroglyphs'.

--updated--

> 
> Ah, Beautiful Spam

Nope, it's 'filler', we gon break the previous hype thread length record! Yeah! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
